Class AvatarServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.trial_by_combat.web.servlets.AvatarServlet

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/avatar")
public class AvatarServlet
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • AvatarServlet

        @Autowired
public AvatarServlet(com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.AvatarService avatarService,
                                 com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.PlayerService playerService)
        Database access dependency injection. AvatarService, PlayerService Dependency Injection.
        Parameters:
        avatarService - calls the Avatar Data Access Object to interact with database.
        playerService - calls the Player Data Access Object to interact with database.
